greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A130296 + A002260 - A000012. Triangle read by rows: row n consists of n, 2, 3, 4,...n.
formula: A130296 + A002260 - A000012 as infinite lower triangular matrices.
T(n, 1) = n, T(n, k) = k for k > 1. - _Michel Marcus_, Feb 12 2014
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
program: (PARI) t(n, k) = if (k==1, n, k); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 12 2014
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Jul 18 2007
